member.name: IDWriteGlyphRunAnalysis.CreateAlphaTexture
member.summary: Creates an alpha texture of the specified type for glyphs within a specified bounding rectangle.
member.param: A value that specifies the type of texture requested. This can be or DWRITE_TEXTURE_CLEARTYPE_3x1. If a bi-level texture is requested, the texture contains only bi-level glyphs. Otherwise, the texture contains only antialiased glyphs.
The bounding rectangle of the texture, which can be different than the bounding rectangle returned by .
When this method returns, contains the array of alpha values from the texture. The buffer allocated for this array must be at least the size of bufferSize.
The size of the alphaValues array, in bytes. The minimum size depends on the dimensions of the rectangle and the type of texture requested.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteGlyphRunAnalysis.GetAlphaBlendParams
member.summary: Gets alpha blending properties required for ClearType blending.
member.param: An object that specifies the ClearType level and enhanced contrast, gamma, pixel geometry, and rendering mode. In most cases, the values returned by the output parameters of this method are based on the properties of this object, unless a GDI-compatible rendering mode was specified.
When this method returns, contains the gamma value to use for gamma correction.
When this method returns, contains the enhanced contrast value to be used for blending.
When this method returns, contains the ClearType level used in the alpha blending.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteGlyphRunAnalysis.GetAlphaTextureBounds
member.summary: Gets the bounding rectangle of the physical pixels affected by the glyph run.
member.param: Specifies the type of texture requested. If a bi-level texture is requested, the bounding rectangle includes only bi-level glyphs. Otherwise, the bounding rectangle includes only antialiased glyphs.
When this method returns, contains the bounding rectangle of the physical pixels affected by the glyph run, or an empty rectangle if there are no glyphs of the specified texture type.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
